inspirations.name: Robotics in Medicine
inspirations.description: Explore the fascinating intersection of robotics and medicine. Develop innovative robotic solutions for surgeries, rehabilitation, and medical diagnostics to improve patient care and save lives.

inspirations.name: Autonomous Vehicles
inspirations.description: Pioneer the field of autonomous vehicles. Design and build self-driving cars, drones, and other robotic vehicles that can navigate and operate independently, revolutionizing transportation and logistics.

inspirations.name: Robotics in Education
inspirations.description: Promote robotics in education. Develop educational programs and workshops to inspire and teach the next generation about robotics, coding, and problem-solving, fostering a passion for STEM fields.

inspirations.name: Robotics in Space Exploration
inspirations.description: Embark on exciting space exploration missions with robotics. Contribute to the development of robots for extraterrestrial exploration, satellite servicing, and asteroid mining, advancing humanity's reach into the cosmos.
